description: This dataset contains summary information on payments made to vendors that received $25,000 or more in fiscal year 2012.  The data is also published and searchable online on the www.spending.dbm.maryland.gov website.

metadata.attribution: Maryland Department of Information Technology and Maryland Department of Budget and Management
metadata.description: This dataset contains summary information on payments made to vendors that received $25,000 or more in fiscal year 2012.  The data is also published and searchable online on the www.spending.dbm.maryland.gov website.

name: Maryland Funding FY12 Payments Data
